sailpoint.integration
Class ApacheHttpClient

java.lang.Object
  sailpoint.integration.ApacheHttpClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpClient
public class ApacheHttpClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements HttpClient

An implementation of HttpClient that delegates all calls to the Apache HTTP client.

                  java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  java.lang.String timeoutInSeconds,
                  java.util.Map options)
           throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from interface: HttpClient
Setup this client using the given configuration.

Specified by:
setup in interface HttpClient
Parameters:
useSSL - Whether to use SSL or not.
port - The port to use for the requests.
username - The username for basic HTTP auth (optional).
password - The password for basic HTTP auth (optional).
timeoutInSeconds - The request timeout in seconds (optional).
options - A map of options used to configure this client (optional).

java.lang.Exception
